title: Patient Cannot Afford Treatment but Needs Care
summary: A single parent has an urgent dental abscess and no insurance or savings. Balance sustainability and compassion; choose payment plan, referral, or structured charity protocol.

scene.setting: A single parent has an urgent dental abscess and no insurance or savings. You feel moral tension; the hidden risk is financial precedent. The decision point is discount, refer, or payment plan.

beats.narration: The need is urgent; the patient cannot pay. The decision point is how to balance care and sustainability.

dialogue.speaker: doc
dialogue.line: We're going to get you out of pain. Let's look at payment options and any assistance programs we can connect you to.

choices.label: Provide urgent care at a steep discount and absorb the cost.

steps.step: Provide care; document one charity criterion or cap for sustainability.

leader_lines: We're doing this today. Going forward we'll have criteria so we can sustain this.
questions: How do we make charity sustainable?
Annual budget or cap? Criteria for pro bono?
scripts.closing_line: Document and track exceptions; one criterion for next time.

choices.label: Offer a payment plan and connect them to financing or assistance programs.

steps.step: Offer payment plan; connect to financing or assistance; provide urgent care.
Document one charity protocol element (eligibility, cap, or referral list).

leader_lines: Here's a path that works for your situation and ours.
questions: What would a charity protocol include?
What community resources do we have?
scripts.closing_line: Eligibility criteria; cap or quota; referral to community resources.

choices.label: Refer to a low-cost clinic or emergency department.

steps.step: Provide clear list of referral options; offer follow-up if they return.

leader_lines: Here are places that can help. We can follow up when you're ready.
questions: When do we refer vs treat?
How do we document and follow up?
scripts.closing_line: Clear referral list; follow-up if they return.

choices.label: Refuse to treat without payment and send them out.

steps.step: Adopt one written policy for financial hardship; sliding scale or charity quota.

leader_lines: We need a policy so we can balance mission and margin.
questions: What would a financial hardship policy include?
scripts.closing_line: Written policy; team alignment on when to flex.

system_prompts.nudge: Structure supports both patient and practice.
system_prompts.mirror_call: Did you balance care and sustainability or draw a hard line?

outcomes.message: Reputation may suffer. A chance to balance care and sustainability was missed.
reflection_questions: What would have changed with one payment option or referral?
How do you balance mission and margin?

outcomes.message: The patient has a path. Charity protocol is clearer; sustainability and compassion aligned.

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week I balanced sustainability and compassion. (1-5)
